_header: An holy man at preaching sat / And thought that sermon wonder sweet
Title(s): Northern Homily Cycle ; Devil in Church
_description: The Devil in Church, in the Northern Homily Cycle — in couplets

BodSelSup52.First Lines:
A holy man satt at aprechyng& had þer of grett
                    lykyng…
BodSelSup52.Last Lines:
…Now Ihesu cryst rtow hys myȝtbryng vs all to heuyn
                    bryȝt

BodAsh42.First Lines:
A hali man at prechinge gon siteAnd thoȝt þe prechinge
                    ferli swete…
BodAsh42.Last Lines:
…Oure lorde vs schelde fra his stelingeAnd to þe blisse
                    of heuene vs bringe
BodAsh42.Editions:
Thompson,  Anne B.,
                        ed.  
             The Northern Homily
                    Cycle.
         Kalamazoo, MI: Western Michigan University for TEAMS, 2008.

BodEngPoeta1.First Lines:
AN holy mon at Sarmoun seeteAnd þhouȝte þat sarmoun
                    wonder swete…
BodEngPoeta1.Last Lines:
…AMEN I rede we alle syngeffor of þat blis is non
                    endynge. Amen.
BodEngPoeta1.Attributed Title:
Hou þe deuel entyset men to slep wen þey scholde hyre godes
                    wordes (f. 186vb)
BodEngPoeta1.Facsimiles:
Doyle,  I. A.,
                        ed.  
             The Vernon Manuscript. A Facsimile of Bodleian Library, Oxford, MS Eng.
                poet.a.1,
          with an introduction by A. I. Doyle. Cambridge: D. S. Brewer, 1987. 
Scase,  Wendy,  and  Nick Kennedy, eds.  
             A facsimile edition of the Vernon manuscript: Oxford, Bodleian Library, MS. Eng. Poet. A. 1.
         Oxford: The Bodleian Library, 2011.
BodEngPoeta1.Editions:
Horstmann,  Carl. 
             “Die Evangelien-Geschichten der Homiliensammlung des Ms. Vernon.” 
             Archiv für das Studium der neueren Sprachen und
                Literaturen
         57 (1877): 241-316: 276.

CULAdd8335.First Lines:
An holi man sat at o prechyngAnd had yere of ful grete
                    likyng…
CULAdd8335.Last Lines:
…Nowe ihesu crist fordo his myghtAnd bryng vs alle to heuen
                    bright

CULDd11.First Lines:
An holi man at a sarmoun sete& þouhte þe sarmoun
                    wunder swete…
CULDd11.Last Lines:
…Amen I rede we alle syngfor of þat blisse is non
                    endyng

MinULZ822.First Lines:
Ane haly man at a sermon setteand thoght þe sermon wondyr
                    swete…
MinULZ822.Last Lines:
…oure lorde vs schelde fra his be gyllyngand to þe blysse
                    of heuen vs bryng

HunHM129.First Lines:
An holy man at sermonne seteAnd þoght þe sermonde wondyr
                    swete…
HunHM129.Last Lines:
…Oure loueryd vs schyld fro his stellyngeAnd to þe bles
                    of heuyn vs brynge
HunHM129.Note: This MS begins four lines earlier, with last four lines of 4672.
